pros: The position can be flexible for your preference to research or teaching: There are some support for early career researchers from the university. The environment is quite diverse and potentially for collaboration building if you have special skills.
cons: Lack of stability due to yearly contract for the job, you can lost your job if you have not gotten funds to support your salary.

job_title: Postdoctoral Research Associate & Project Engineer in San Diego, CA
pros: Nice people and nice place. Good career outlook if you are the right person.
cons: The management some time can be a little too political.

pros: It is a mess of administration, the lack of leadership, and inaccuracy of scientific results.
cons: As another post-doc scientist said:" It is a nightmare to be at UNSW"

job_title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow in Washington, DC
pros: Great research topics about agricultural technology
Good environment and salary and learning environment
